獀字的基本解释

獀
sōu
古同“蒐”，古代君主春天围猎：“放乎獀狩。”
选择：“是月也，天子乃教于田猎，以习五戎。獀马。”

獀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sōu］
［《廣韻》所鳩切，平尤，生。］
(1)同“蒐”。打猎。指春猎。
(2)通“搜”。拣择，选择。

獀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獀； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页716第23
【廣韻】所鳩切【集韻】疎鳩切，?音蒐。【玉篇】本作?。秋獵也。【禮·祭義】放乎獀狩。　又【廣韻】獿獀，南越人名犬。　又【類篇】先侯切，音涑。義同。　又【集韻】所九切，音溲。春獵名。【周語】獀于農隟。

獀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獀字的起名意思

暂无。

autumn hunting
Basic explanation of words
autumn hunting
sōu
The ancient same "search", the ancient monarchs hunted in spring: "Let's put it in a hunting dog."
Choice: "It's the moon, and the emperor teaches hunting in the field to practice the Five Rongs. Zhang Ma."
autumn hunting
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sōu]
["Guangyun" was cut, Pingyou, and born. ]
(1) Same as "search". hunt. Refers to spring hunting.
(2) Link "Search". Choose, choose.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　獀; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 716 23
[Guang Yun] All dove cuts [Ji Yun] Nine dove cuts,? Sound search. [Jade articles] This work?. Autumn hunting also. 【Rituals and Sacrifices】It is put on the hunter.　[Guangyun] Jiang Cang, a famous dog from South Vietnam.　[Classes] Hou Hou cuts first, and the sound decays. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The nine cuts, the sound is 溲. Spring hunting name. 【Zhou Yu】Zhang Yu Nonghuan.
